hanzi-su-wiki:
買

Значения

Покупать

Мнемоника

  • Есть деньги 貝 в сети 罒, можешь что-то купить.

  • Раковины моллюсков 貝 использовались, чтобы покупать вещи вместо денег (как 罒).

Варианты

买

heisig_chinese_memo: When something catches my eye, I take out a few clams and buy before anybody else does.
heisig_constituent: buy, eye, cross-eyed, net, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: When something catches my eye, I take out a few clams and buy before anybody else does.
koohiiStory2: Rules to Buying: 1. You´ve had your eye on it for a while. 2. You have enough shells to afford it.
jp_example_words:
購買(こうばい): purchase, buy
売買(ばいばい): trade, buying and selling
買い物(かいもの): shopping
買う(かう): buy
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There are some shellfish in a net that you can buy. You can't just buy loose shellfish. You can only buy the ones that are in the net, bagged up and ready for your money.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine looking over a bunch of different kinds of shellfish wrapped in nets. Think about which ones you want to buy.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to buy as many shellfish as you can fit in your car (か). You keep buying until your car is completely full of shellfish before you stop. Cars are totally a realistic unit of measure.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine buying an entire car's worth of shellfish. Mmm delicious.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 目 (глаз), 買 (покупать), 貝 (раковина)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you can net (罒) the shellfish (貝), or you can buy it ...
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: All of the French soldiers have to buy their own beret for their heads.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (買, 买, mai, buy) is a combination of a net (网, wang, net) and a seashell . A net is a useful tool for gathering things, and seashells mean money. Therefore, this signifies a scene where a person is purchasing something sold in a net and is paying with seashells. (價, 价, jia, price) On the left is a man, on the right is a lid of a bowl filled with goods, and a seashell — which means money — below the character. People are selling and buying, haggling over the price.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle and Bronze inscriptions are from " shell " from " net ", Shang Chengzuo's "Yin Qi Lost" page 66 said: "It is like taking shellfish from the net". From the common sense, the ancients always wanted currency (shells) to buy things in the market, or they needed to carry them through the net.

Oracle bone inscriptions are used for names, and bronze inscriptions are used for national names and names. Zhongluo: "Bai (Bo) buys his father", but it does not indicate the meaning of buying and selling.

Qin bamboo slips first saw the meaning of buying and selling, and both buying and selling were expressed by the word " buy ." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty": "There are buying (selling) and buying, and each baby has its own price (price)."

"Shu Wen": "City also. From the net shells. "Mencius" said: "The monopoly and the Internet market profit." Duan Yucai's note: "The marketer, the place to buy things. Therefore, the purchase of things is also the market.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle and Bronze inscriptions are from " shell " from " net ", Shang Chengzuo's "Yin Qi Lost" page 66 said: "It is like taking shellfish from the net" From the common sense, the ancients always wanted currency (shells) to buy things in the market, or they needed to carry them through the net.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨及金文均從「貝」從「网」，商承祚《殷契佚存》頁66說：「象以網取貝之形」。從常識看，古人於市上買物，總要貨幣(貝)，又或需以網攜帶。

　　甲骨文用作人名，金文用作國族名和人名。中甗：「白(伯)買父」，未見表示買賣之義。

　　秦簡始見買賣之義，而買、賣均以「買」字表示。《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》：「有買(賣)及買也，各嬰其賈(價)」。

　　《說文》：「市也。从网貝。《孟子》曰：『登壟斷而网市利。』」段玉裁注：「市者，買物之所。因之買物亦言市。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨及金文均從「貝」從「网」，商承祚《殷契佚存》頁66說：「象以網取貝之形」。從常識看，古人於市上買物，總要貨幣(貝)，又或需以網攜帶。

①拿錢換東西，與“賣”相對：買賣。買辦(ａ．中國明代專指對宮廷供應用品的商人；b．鴉片戰爭後指外國商人在中國市場上推銷商品的代理人)。買名。買好。買笑(舊指到妓院尋歡作樂)。買主。買方。買春(買酒，唐代酒名多帶“春”字)。
②招致：買禍。
③姓氏。

甲骨及金文均從「 貝 」從「 网 」，商承祚《殷契佚存》頁66說：「象以網取貝之形」。從常識看，古人於市上買物，總要貨幣(貝)，又或需以網攜帶。 甲骨文用作人名，金文用作國族名和人名。中甗：「白(伯)買父」，未見表示買賣之義。 秦簡始見買賣之義，而買、賣均以「 買 」字表示。《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》：「有買(賣)及買也，各嬰其賈(價)」。 《說文》：「市也。从网貝。《孟子》曰：『登壟斷而网市利。』」段玉裁注：「市者，買物之所。因之買物亦言市。」
Oracle and Bronze inscriptions are from " shell" from " net", Shang Chengzuo's "Yin Qi Lost" page 66 said: "It is like taking shellfish from the net". From the common sense, the ancients always wanted currency (shells) to buy things in the market, or they needed to carry them through the net. Oracle bone inscriptions are used for names, and bronze inscriptions are used for national names and names. Zhongluo: "Bai (Bo) buys his father", but it does not indicate the meaning of buying and selling. Qin bamboo slips first saw the meaning of buying and selling, and both buying and selling were expressed by the word " buy." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty": "There are buying (selling) and buying, and each baby has its own price (price)." "Shu Wen": "City also. From the net shells. "Mencius" said: "The monopoly and the Internet market profit." Duan Yucai's note: "The marketer, the place to buy things. Therefore, the purchase of things is also the market.

買字的基本解释

買
mǎi
见“买”。

買字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǎi］
［《廣韻》莫蟹切，上蟹，明。］
“买1”的繁体字。
(1)购进；以钱购物。与“賣”相对。
(2)指买卖、营业。
(3)雇，租。
(4)收买，买通。
(5)招惹；引起。
(6)博取；追逐。参见“買譽”、“買名”。
(7)增添。参见“買壽”。
(8)姓。五代有买叔午，宋有进士买天英。见《正字通》。

買字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　買； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1206第21
【唐韻】【正韻】莫蟹切【集韻】【韻會】母蟹切，?音蕒。【說文】作?，市也。【增韻】售人之物曰買。【急就篇註】出曰賣，入曰買。【周禮·天官·小宰】聽賣買以質劑。【前漢·食貨志】衆民賣買五穀、布帛、絲緜之物。　又姓。【氏族略】五代買叔午。

買字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
買字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
buy
mǎi

buy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǎi］
["Guangyun" Do not cut crabs, serve crabs, Ming. ]
"Buy 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Purchase; shopping with money. Contrast with "sell".
(2) Refers to trading and business.
(3) Hire, rent.
(4) Buying, buying.
(5) Provoke; cause.
(6) Acquire; chase. See "buying reputation", "buying name".
(7) Add. See "Buy Life".
(8) Last name. In the Five Dynasties, there was Shuwu, and there was Jinshi in Song Dynasty who bought Tianying. See "Zhengzitong".
buy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　Buy; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1206 No. 21
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Crab Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Female Crab Cut,? Yin Xian. [Said the text] For?, the city also. [Zeng Yun] What is sold is called buy. [Anxiety to the article] Selling means selling, and buying means buying. [Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Xiao Zai】Listen to sell to buy quality agent. [Pre-Han · Food and Goods History] The people sold and bought grains, cloth and silk.　Another last name. 【Clan Profile】Buy Shuwu for the Five Dynasties.

mǎi
вм. 买

買

Значения

Покупать

Мнемоника

  • Есть деньги 貝 в сети 罒, можешь что-то купить.

  • Раковины моллюсков 貝 использовались, чтобы покупать вещи вместо денег (как 罒).

Варианты

买

Radicals: 罒, 貝  (net, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
There are some shellfish in a net that you can buy. You can't just buy loose shellfish. You can only buy the ones that are in the net, bagged up and ready for your money.
Imagine looking over a bunch of different kinds of shellfish wrapped in nets. Think about which ones you want to buy.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to buy as many shellfish as you can fit in your car (か). You keep buying until your car is completely full of shellfish before you stop. Cars are totally a realistic unit of measure.
Imagine buying an entire car's worth of shellfish. Mmm delicious.
